name: AWSCodePipelinePipelineStagesBlockers
description: Blockers is a property of the AWS CodePipeline Pipeline Stages property that specifies an AWS CodePipeline gate declaration.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the gate declaration.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of gate declaration. For valid values, see BlockerDeclaration in the AWS CodePipeline API Reference.
